programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Staff at D-Place argue constantly and the subpar food is regularly sent back to the kitchen.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay helps a soul food restaurant owner who can't seem to let her head chef do any of the cooking.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Multimillionaire Barry Larson owns La Riviera, an Inverness fine-dining restaurant.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay travels to the Juniper Hill Inn in Windsor, Vt., a place that's beauty is undermined by the smell of raw sewage and the owner's poor treatment of the staff.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay visits the Roosevelt Inn and learns the owner is more interested in preparing for murder mystery nights than updating musty decor.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay visits Las Cruces, N.M., luxury hotel Meson De Mesilla, where the owner seems more interested in her singing career, than managing the business.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon helps the owner of the Hotel Monticello in Longview, Wash., get back on track both professionally and personally.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay travels to Oregon to help a contentious divorced couple focus on fixing issues with their business, the Applegate River Lodge.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay goes to Vermont in hope of transforming the dog-friendly Four Seasons Inn -- which proves to not share any likeness to the popular luxury chain.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon heads to Northern California where he works to get the owners of Murphy's Hotel to focus on the guests' experience in order to keep the establishment in business.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Woodbury, Conn., to help a pair of siblings whose difficult relationship is threatening to bring down their inn, the Curtis House.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Pipestone, Minn., to help two sisters save their once-historic hotel, the Calumet Inn.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: The young owner of a Florida beachfront inn struggles to keep control of his business and repay a loan from his brother.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon visits a lodge in Idaho that was built by the owner's own hands before the entrepreneur lost his passion due to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Gordon Behind Bars
programme.desc: Gordon needs to pick 12 men to form a dependable team for his business.

programme.title: Gordon Behind Bars
programme.desc: The prison's routines and systems start getting to Gordon, and he struggles to keep his team in line.

programme.title: Gordon Behind Bars
programme.desc: Gordon invites players from the coffee shop industry are to the prison to try some of the food.

programme.title: Gordon Behind Bars
programme.desc: Gordon must find a business willing to buy his prison-made products in order to keep the business alive.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay: Shark Bait
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay sets out to investigate the controversial "shark fin soup."

programme.title: Gordon's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay starts his culinary journey in the north of India where he cooks for 400 passengers in an express train's cramped pantry car.

programme.title: Gordon's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon immerses himself in the life of a local tribe in Nagaland, visits Assam to enter a housewives' competition and sets up shop on the streets of Calcutta.

programme.title: Gordon's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon ends his travels to India by heading south, living in an ashram in Kerala and working alongside one of India's top chefs in Mumbai.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: A West Virginia inn owner hoards personal items throughout the premises and displays some of the worst practices Gordon has ever seen.

programme.title: Hotel Hell

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Ramsay helps the married owners of a Southbridge, Mass., inn modeled after an historic Austrian bed and breakfast update their business.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon attempts to get the owner of a hotel and event space in Newtown, Pa., to address various issues with the business.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
